articles.author: Leah Asmelash, CNN
articles.title: Race car driver Jessi Combs has posthumously been named the fastest woman on Earth by Guinness - CNN
articles.description: Combs, who died the day of the attempt, broke the record by clocking a speed of 522.783 mph in a jet-powered car. She's the first person to break the record in more than 40 years, Guinness said.
